content:
I've thought about automating analytics dynamically and enabling the community to share common outputs a'la fashion of geekbench etc.
https://github.com/rust-secure-code/wg/issues/43
This could nudge maintainers with valuable data and more importantly for the WG it could provide a lot of security related data e.g. in the past what exact dependency tree was used in a given build time - f.ex. to determine later the point in time where the real dependency picked up by cargo build was still insecure - or not - when not pinned down hard to know for certain what was supposed to be used.
